cleaned_text: Quantum Integrative Medicine is a wellness center for the mind, body and spirit. We believe that all of us contain an innate power to heal ourselves physically, intellectually, emotionally and spiritually. We provide a safe and caring environment to inspire and empower people to do just that. We are here to support and encourage that growth with cutting edge therapies and open hearts. Our doctors believe that Western and Eastern medicine working hand in hand provides the best opportunity for health. We function as a team and offer a comprehensive approach to your healing. To unlock each person's unique power to heal, we identify and address the barriers preventing vibrant health. We listen, test, teach and support our clients as they work in partnership with us. We are here to support all aspects of your healing: emotional, physical, and spiritual.
